trends: There has been one other sighting in College Park
There were no other sightings in College Park on or around February 17th 2012
Summary: I SAW SOMETHING FORMING IN THE CLOUDS OVER THE AIRPORT IN ATLANTA
divs: Sighting DetailsI was travliing east on HWY 285 FEB. 17TH. 2021 I was passing the riverdale rd. exit when i notice the clouds making a circel pattern in the sky. So I pulled over to film it. Then the cloud started to push down like something was weighing it down. I thought it could be a UFO, but i was scared to find out. As I made my video, I said 2012 thet are here. And something said to me, we have all ways been here. I looked around, and there was no one. I don't want to sound crazy, but something talked to me that day.I pulled off and for the last 9 months I can feel things I can't explain.
